main event: A civilian reported seeing a long tube-like object with a blue and red band at the rear, giving off yellow sparks, while driving in Rehoboth, Massachusetts, in September 1965.
interesting points: The observation lasted only a few seconds while the observer was driving a car., The object was thought to potentially be an aircraft or even a meteor., A sketch in the report described the object as having a round or bell-like structure and red color., The report expressed skepticism, concluding it was likely a misinterpretation of a conventional object., The observer was described as being very enthused about sky objects.
sighted object: long tube-like object with blue and red band
witness description: a civilian who appeared messy and disorganized in the report
